a dar un empujón, porque tienes todas las posibilidades de salir adelante” el
objetivo en esta etapa es capacitar a estas personas en habilidades de vida,
emprendimiento y equipamiento laboral, para finalizar con una oferta formal de
trabajo, ya sea en la pizzería o en una organización que aliada. 
¿Cómo funciona y en qué consiste?
Imaginaria D.C. tendrá un local independiente en Bogotá
– Colombia, ubicada centralmente donde tanto turistas como bogotanos puedan
acercarse y  vivir una experiencia que
inicie con el aroma de una pizza que bien merece la pena comer; vitrinas con
pizzas, recetas nuevas, simples pero con innovación de sabores y mezclas,
dejando de lado lo tradicional de las pizzas y poder brindar un bocado de
Colombia en cada pizza, si te encanta probar cosas nuevas, estas pizzas tendrás
que probarlas.  
No es una pizzería común. 
Detrás de la experiencia gastronómica,
se encuentra el corazón de D.C. Imaginaría, y todo empezará con una sección en
el menú llamada “pizza pendiente” ¿por qué tienen una sección especial del
menú? Porque D.C. Imaginaria cubre un porcentaje del precio de estas, y por
cada cinco pizzas pendientes que nuestros clientes donen D.C. imaginaria pagará
otra pizza pendiente para las personas víctimas del desplazamiento mayores de
edad que viven en Bogotá. 
En Colombia el  desplazamiento por la violencia afecta a
miles de colombianos cada año,  de hecho
hoy en día, buena parte de los hogares colombianos afectados viven en
condiciones críticas, que en la mayoría de los casos son peores que las que
caracterizan la indigencia; según estudios realizados para la Misión de la
Pobreza y la Desigualdad de Planeación Nacional la situación de los hogares
víctimas del desplazamiento en los municipios receptores es más precaria que la
que viven en los mismos lugares los pobres urbanos y los hogares indigentes. 
Los niveles de desempleo para los
miembros de los hogares desplazados son mucho más altos que los que se tienen
para los miembros de familias pobres urbanas y rurales e indigentes urbanos,
los niveles de cabezas de familia analfabetas es mayor que en otros grupos, es
por esto que decidimos trabajar con ellos no solo para brindarles una porción
de alimento sino para generar una solución que pueda acabar con su ciclo de
pobreza, generando un empleo, dignificando a la persona que salió del campo y
ahora recorre el asfalto sin muchas garantías, brindando herramientas para que
puedan salir adelante. 
¿Cómo queremos lograrlo? 
Primero es importante aclarar que
D.C. Imaginaria es una organización con fines de lucro, podríamos decir que
está basado en un modelo híbrido de negocio, es decir que genera un cambio
social antes de tener un retorno de inversión, siendo al mismo tiempo lucrativo
y funcional, el plan es llegar al retorno de inversión los primeros seis meses
de funcionamiento, pero que semana a semana el dinero que se genere sea
suficiente para cubrir los gastos operativos. Para esto es indispensable
mantener un producto de calidad y un servicio humano excepcional. 
El plan para el programa de
cambio social es crear un programa de sensibilización para la generación de
nuevos empleos que pueda presentarse en organizaciones, fundaciones y empresas
que quieran y puedan hacer parte de este proyecto. En constante seguimiento con
nuestro apoyo para poder capacitar a las personas que estén comprometidos con
dar un cambio a su vida, los vamos a apoyar, a capacitar, a dignificar para que
puedan contar con las herramientas necesarias para su sostenimiento.

¿Quiénes somos? 

Dos jóvenes colombianas psicólogas, apasionadas por la comida y decididas a hacer un cambio. Soñamos con un proyecto que una
nuestra pasión, misión, profesión y vocación para volverlo nuestro propósito.
Queremos promover un gesto solidario e integrador con quienes no tienen recursos.
Nuestra idea parte con la labor que se está llevando a cabo en Argentina,
Chile, México con café pendiente y sensibilizadas por el impacto que está tiene
decidimos unirnos y trabajar en un proyecto en donde pudiéramos poner en marcha
esta idea. 

Con esta campaña la vamos a sacar del estadio!!
Esto ya no se trata de nuestra campaña, se trata de cambiar la forma de pensar en los demás, esta idea no termina con la entrega de una pizza a alguien que tiene hambre. Queremos crear una revolución en las personas que nos visiten, que puedan ser testigos del impacto que crean con su colaboración; sencillamente queremos darle la oportunidad a las personas de ayudar fácilmente a otro: De ser parte del cambio, de cómo SU INVERSIÓN cambió la vida de alguien e inspiró a muchos otros a seguirlo haciendo. Podemos hacer esto juntos !
“Un simple acto de caridad, crea una espiral sin fin que
siempre vuelve hacia ti”

Nuestro objetivo es ser una pequeña solución al creciente problema. También queremos que sea lo más fácil posible para las personas que nos siguen y apoyan ser parte de este viaje con nosotras! 
Por favor, ayúdanos a difundir esta campaña a través de los medios sociales, el boca a boca y compartirlo con tus amigos !!! Y los amigos de tus amigos !!!Tu participación en esta campaña es muy significativa!
¿Cómo vamos a utilizar el dinero?

 Buscamos financiamiento de 13.000 USD aproximadamente 35 millones de pesos Colombianos, que estarán destinados a la compra de materias primas, instrumentos, mobiliario, instalaciones y adecuaciones del local, que son necesarios para iniciar con la venta de las pizzas. Para esto debemos destinar 7.400 USD - 20 millones de pesos. 
El dinero restante estará destinado a cubrir: 
- Pizzas pendientes (a cargo de imaginaría por el primer mes) 
- Gastos de constitución
- Publicidad 
- Pagos de los primeros dos meses de funcionamiento:
* Alquiler
* Suministros
* Servicios públicos
* Gastos de personal ( 1 cocinero - 2 meseros) 
También puedes ayudar !
 
¿Quiénes pueden participar?
Toda persona que quiera ser parte
del cambio abonando una comida pendiente una comida. Adicionalmente cualquier
organización, fundación y empresa que quieran hacer parte de este movimiento,
con un programa de sensibilización para la generación de nuevos empleos. Si deseas
ser parte de este movimiento como voluntario, pasante, ángel financiero,
también tenemos un espacio para ti. 
Cómo puedo sumarme a la campaña? 
Todo modelo de negocio tiene etapas, en este momento nos
encontramos en nuestra etapa de financiación, hemos decidido hacerlo desde la
plataforma Crowdfunding Indiegogo, deseamos evitar el endeudamiento con
entidades financieras, y de esta manera todos pueden empezar a ser parte del
cambio. 
1.  Si
te parece interesante el movimiento y quieres ayudarnos, puedes realizar tu
donación a la campaña, solo necesitas una tarjeta de crédito y muchas ganas de
ayudar. Tu ayuda hace una gran diferencia. 
2.  Comparte
esta campaña con tu familia, en el trabajo, tus amigos, los amigos de tus
amigos y en redes sociales.
Estaremos publicando los avances
y respondiendo cualquier pregunta que pueda surgir en cuanto a la campaña.
Desde ya muchas gracias por colaborar.

story:
FOBOX (Four Oceans Box)

Starting a business is tough, but what if we could automate the hard stuff, take care of all the needed resources, and make it profitable faster? We are excited to share the FOBOX with you. It’s a simple, profitable, business in a box. It’s a semi-permanent rental and retail water sports shop.

THE MOST SIMPLE WAY TO RUN A FUN - ACTIVE - BUSINESS

Your help with this campaign will  make dreams come true, a business without the busyness! A business that promotes travel, fun, and lifestyle.

Limited quantity available for this season!! Lock your locations down for an initial $5000. This secures your EARLY BIRD FOBOX offering of only an additional $30,000 . After this campaign the FOBOX  will be selling for $45,000

We already have 2 under construction for locations in Hawaii!


Automate the Box

We’ve simplified the back end of the business by combining some of the best software together to automate many of the headaches of operating a business. That's right, we are tackling such things as accounting, HR,  inventory, personnel, payroll, insurance, Point of Sale, and more. It's time to give the power back to the people, so you can enjoy operating your business as much as your clients are enjoying your services.


Profitable Box

Our unique model is profitable in a variety of ways: we rent and sell premium product, as well as offer a 'try then buy' program that extend market reach. The lifestyle is customizable to you and your passions, and multiple revenue streams can be added such as lessons, excursions, corporate events, yoga, fitness, and others. 


Eco Box

Powered by the sun (solar), the wind (turbine), and the ocean (Well, a salt water Aquion battery that is)


What's the definition of creativity:          

"Giving the world something it didn't know it was missing." 

                                                 - Daniel pink (Best selling author of DRIVE)


Featured Perks

We have collaborated with others that we think are worth supporting. Enjoy our limited time offer of these perks! 


$75 Towel Collaboration 

Where Four Oceans meets BCH PRK - Hawaii meets Southern California. 

We like to call it …”The Drone shot” 

This is a collaboration of good friends doing fun and awesome things. BCH PRK is a cool company from Southern California, but originally from the big Island of Hawaii. We love the beach and the Ocean, our two shared loves have became our individual companies and we thought the timing was right to combine them. Enjoy this one of kind towel!


$1500 Stand Up Paddle Board Collaboration 

  10% of profits donated to Jon Mozo Foundation

This board is made on behalf of the  pioneer and legendary ocean photographer, the late Jon Mozo, who gave his life capturing beauty for others. To all those that follow in his wake, this board is for you. It is our inflatable travel board and we hope it inspires you as much as Jon has inspired us. 

His parting words were: 

                                 "KIA KAHA "

Maori for...      BE STRONG. BE COURAGEOUS. BE POWERFUL. 



$50 Commitment Shirts

Pick your light or dark grey T-shirt, and then live this motto...Live Inside The Postcard. Do more than you say, and live your life full of purpose. Let us know your size and color and we'll send you your commitment shirt to start changing your life now! 


With our turn key solution, you can operate near any body of water, river, lake, ocean, or other ideal locations.

                        Even cold lakes are great! 

 
We tested a prototype model of the FOBOX over the past two summers in Waterton, Canada. We found that our model was profitable even in locations where limitations exist, such as short summers and cold water. 

In the Box


Outside the Box

On the water we “Live Inside The Postcard,” but in the boardroom we “Live Outside The Box.” We have creatively assembled the necessary elements to make a FOBOX run as a streamlined and nimble business. Our network of partnerships has been established not only to to facilitate our current needs, but also to scale with your success! We work with:



Allocation of funds

Here's the breakdown:

Box - Improving the design, functionality, and starting production. 

Product - New designs, and starting production.

Software - Fine tuning the software, including upgrading speed, accuracy, and user ability. 

Marketing -  advertising and launching media content in preparation for your box launches.

EMPOWERING PEOPLE - To do their Passion

…it’s the beginning of a revolution, of disruptive eco chain shops run by the individual.They give customized and authentic service and experiences to the public that can’t be duplicated in a corporate owned franchise. 

Years of effort have gone into sourcing, building relationships, connecting the dots, and trial and error to make this possible. Relationships take time and effort and getting over the hump of the first couple years as a business is also tough, we have in essence done the hard stuff so you can now operate at a higher success rate with many of the things that bring down business, taken care of. 


Premium Product

We are dedicated to offer high quality products and source that same quality for rent and sale. 


Team

We have already been accepting resumes, so we can build our a team to help you with your FOBOX expansion.  We haven't finalize the team yet, so if this is your thing, and you think you can add value let us know and submit a resume or Linkedin Profile to info@fouroceanspaddle.com


FAQ

How much does it cost to operate?

After picking your location, there will be the following costs to be aware of, lease, software fees, and ongoing product costs. 

Is it a franchise or is it licensed ?

We are not a franchise, we license our software to you, and sell you the FOBOX and all the product you need. 

Do I need business experience ?

You don't necessarily need business experience, that is the point of the FOBOX, but it would help. 


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::


We are grateful for any and all support! At minimum please share our campaign with your friends!

                              THANK YOU!!

Thanks for making it all the way down here for that, you could take advantage of our super Secret Perk for a Secret Getaway. Only 2 available...

****** https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-fobox/x/... *****

story:
We’re Bernardo and Andrea, founders of Mezcal Tribal, a company that produces artisanal mezcals.

 We were attracted to mezcal because of the rich history and tradition of the Mexicans who have made it for hundreds of years. We thought it was a great fit for our skillset: my wife is a chef and I have experience in the liquor industry.

We’re passionate about the flavors and aromas of foods and beverages since they form an important part of our daily lives. This product allows us to express ourselves and share our passion with the world.
 

Our Indiegogo campaign, an exclusive presale

We first started working on this project five years ago, and we’re already selling our mezcal in Mexico. We tried to enter the US market last year, but we found out that doing so is extremely difficult for small businesses like ours. As a result, we decided to create an exceptional new product that could compete with the best and offer something unique to the market. Fortunately, our efforts were rewarded, and this year we won the award for best mezcal at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. We’ve also found a way to enter the US market by using a logistic services company. However, the first shipment will be very expensive, which is why we have started this Indiegogo campaign. By preselling our product this unique pre sales Event on Indiegogo, we’ll be able to raise the funds to get it to the US. 


Why Here?

Mezcal Tribal needs your help in order to take this important next step in our history. We want you to be able to hold our handmade dream in your hands. Being able to make our first shipment would give us the opportunity to enter a new potential market, allowing us to share our passion with millions of people. 

     
 

What do we need to take the next step? 

At a minimum, we need to reach sales of $40,000 in order to cover import and logistics costs, as well as expenses for the first shipment of Mezcal Tribal. American Spirits Exchange LTD will be our importer.

 

Perk Details

4 Shot Glasses Kit 

  • Collection Shot Glasses, this kit let you share our mezcal with friends. Sand blasted with mezcal Tribal Logo




Ensamble 103, The best mezcal of 2016

  • 1 Voucher for 1 bottle of our award-winning mezcal, made from a combination of espadín, tobala and madrecuixe agave. Some of these agaves had to be aged for over 12 years before being processed. 
  • 2 Shot glass of Mezcal Tribal
  • You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.


Mezcal Tribal Joven Espadín

  • 1 Voucher for 1 bottle of Mezcal Tribal Joven, made from espadín agave using traditional methods. This agave had to be aged up to 7 years before it was ready to be made into great mezcal.
  • You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.


Rested Mezcal bottled on handicrafted Ceramic Bottle

  • 1 Voucher for a bottle of Rested Mezcal Tribal bottled on handicrafted Bottle
  • 2 Shot glasses of Mezcal Tribal
  • You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.


Special Edition Commemorative Ceramic Bottle Ensamble 103 

This is a collectible bottle that will never be produced again. Only 250 bottles will be produced. You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.

This perk includes 1 voucher for 1  handicrafted ceramic bottle filled with Ensamble 103.


Ensamble 103 Retail Package

If you want to be the perfect host or share our mezcal at your establishment, consider this package that contains 1 voucher for 1 box with 6 bottles of Ensamble 103. Your establishment will be permanently listed on our website as a location where Mezcal Tribal can be purchased, and you’ll also be listed as a founding client.

  • 1 Voucher for 6 bottles of mezcal tribal Ensamble 103.
  • Youll be listed on our website in places to find mezcal tribal.
  • In addition, this price includes a discount you pay 5 bottles and get 6 , God Deal!
  • Retail license in CA or NY.


Mezcal Tribal Joven Retail Package

If you want to be the perfect host or share our mezcal at your establishment, consider this package that contains 1 voucher for 1 box with 6 bottles of Mezcal Tribal Joven. Your establishment will be permanently listed on our website as a location where Mezcal Tribal can be purchased, and you’ll also be listed as a founding client.

  • 1 Voucher for 6 bottles of mezcal tribal Joven.
  • Youll be listed on our website in places to find mezcal tribal.
  • In addition, this price includes a discount you pay 5 bottles and get 6 , God Deal!. Offer valid in CA and NY. 
  • Retail license in CA or NY.

Wholesaler Package Ensamble 103

If you’re interested in sharing this exclusive product with your clients, consider this special package that contains

  • 1 voucher for 10 boxes of 6 bottles of Ensamble 103. 
  • You’ll also be listed on our website as a distributor and receive preferential prices from Mezcal Tribal. 
  • This promotion includes a discount, you pay 40 bottles and get 60, its 20 bottles for  free. Good Deal!
  • Exclusive for Wholesaler in all US or Retail in CA and NY. 

Wholesaler Package Mezcal Tribal Joven

If you’re interested in sharing this exclusive product with your clients, consider this special package that contains

  • 1 voucher for 10 boxes of 6 bottles of Mezcal Tribal Joven. 
  • You’ll also be listed on our website as a distributor and receive preferential prices from Mezcal Tribal. 
  • This promotion includes a discount you pay 40 bottles and get 60, its 20 bottles for free!!.
  •  Exclusive for Wholesaler in all US  or Retail in CA and NY.  

Fan Trip

We’d like to invite you to join us in experiencing Mexican culture and flavors while learning about the various distillation processes used to produce mezcal.  The journey begins in Oaxaca. Hosts Bernardo and Andrea will take you to several places that inspire them. Food (authentic Mexican cuisine) and travel within Mezcal Towns and some interesting places close to Oaxaca. 4 days Food, hotel and Tour included (Flight not included)  


We believe that we will achieve our goal and be able to cover the costs of our first shipment to the US. However, if our campaign goal is not met for some reason, your contribution will be returned.


Frequently Asked Questions:

How old do I have to be in order to participate?

In accordance with US law, you must be at least 21 years of age at the time of purchase.

When can I expect to receive my bottle of mezcal?

Once the campaign ends, it will take us approximately two months to complete the necessary paperwork and an additional month to deal with product logistics. American Spirits Exchange LDT will be the company which will manage and import our mezcal. Therefore we hope that our product will be on American soil and ready for delivery within three months, just in time for summer mid-July.

Your vaucher can be changed in the website of our partner company and sent to you. This partner company has the license to ship spirits across 24 states on the US. 

If you have Retail License in CA or NY, you vaucher can be used in American Spirits Exchange LDT  our partner company  licensed to import and sale spirits to retail stores in California and New York.

If you have a distribution license, you vaucher can be used in  American Spirits Exchange LDT  our partner company  licensed to import spirits in USA.


What makes your mezcals unique?

When creating a new mezcal, our first step is to find a master mezcalier who produces the best mezcal. We have tastings of the products of various mezcaliers, and then choose the best product together. We also ensure that the mezcal is made using an artisanal process and work carefully to create the finest product possible.

At this point, we enter the creative part of the process, when we try several options that combine different types of agave in different proportions until we’ve found the unique flavor and aroma we’re looking for. The final step is to label and package the mezcal.

Our Background

Andrea Serra studied to be a chef at the University of San Francisco and later returned to Guadalajara, where she set out to work on various culinary projects. Her spirit of sharing has led her to inspire generations of new chefs throughout her 8 years of teaching.

Bernardo Gonzales studied industrial engineering and has worked in the Mexican liquor industry for 15 years.  Throughout that time, he has had the opportunity to learn in-depth about the processes used by the country’s large tequila, rum and mezcal industries. He has also participated in numerous professional beverage tasting events, most notably those involving agave. 

Thank you for taking the time to watch the video and read about our campaign. Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't be a part of helping us in this huge step . You can:

·  Let your friends know about our company and this campaign

·  Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about this effort

Please make a comment on the page we will  love to now about you

·  Follow us on Facebook, twitter and instagram.

·  If you have a plan which can help us to reach this goal please send us an email trhough the contact form in our website.

Thank you for your time, attention, and support and enjoy life trough aromas and flavors, there are everywhere.!!!

services company. However, the first shipment will be very expensive, which is
why we have started this Indiegogo campaign. By preselling our product this unique pre sales Event on
Indiegogo, we’ll be able to raise the funds to get it to the US. 

Why Here?Mezcal Tribal needs your help in order to take this important next step
in our history. We want you to be able to hold our handmade dream in your
hands. Being able to make our first shipment would give us the opportunity to
enter a new potential market, allowing us to share our passion with millions of
people. 
  
What do we need to take
the next step? 
At a minimum, we need to
reach sales of $40,000 in order to cover import and logistics costs, as well as
expenses for the first shipment of Mezcal Tribal. American Spirits Exchange LTD will be our importer.

 

Perk Details
4 Shot Glasses Kit 



Collection Shot Glasses, this kit let you share our mezcal with friends. Sand blasted with mezcal Tribal Logo







Ensamble
103, The best mezcal of 2016


1 Voucher for 1 bottle of our award-winning mezcal, made from a combination of espadín, tobala
and madrecuixe agave. Some of these agaves had to be aged for over 12 years
before being processed. 

2 Shot glass of Mezcal Tribal

You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.




Mezcal Tribal Joven Espadín



1 Voucher for 1 bottle of Mezcal Tribal Joven, made from espadín agave using traditional methods. This agave had to be aged up to 7 years before it was ready to be made into great mezcal.


You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.





Rested Mezcal bottled on handicrafted Ceramic Bottle


1 Voucher for a bottle of Rested Mezcal Tribal bottled on handicrafted Bottle
2 Shot glasses of Mezcal Tribal
You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.





Special
Edition Commemorative Ceramic Bottle Ensamble 103 
This is a collectible
bottle that will never be produced again. Only 250 bottles will be produced.
You’ll also be listed on our website as a founding client.
This perk includes 1 voucher for 1  handicrafted ceramic bottle filled with Ensamble 103.

Ensamble
103 Retail Package
If
you want to be the perfect host or share our mezcal at your establishment,
consider this package that contains 1 voucher for 1 box with 6 bottles of Ensamble 103. Your
establishment will be permanently listed on our website as a location where
Mezcal Tribal can be purchased, and you’ll also be listed as a founding client.



1 Voucher for 6 bottles of mezcal tribal Ensamble 103.

Youll be listed on our website in places to find mezcal tribal.
In addition, this price includes a discount you pay 5 bottles and get 6 , God Deal!
Retail license in CA or NY.





Mezcal Tribal Joven Retail Package
If you want to be the perfect host or share our mezcal at your establishment, consider this package that contains 1 voucher for 1 box with 6 bottles of Mezcal Tribal Joven. Your establishment will be permanently listed on our website as a location where Mezcal Tribal can be purchased, and you’ll also be listed as a founding client.




1 Voucher for 6 bottles of mezcal tribal Joven.


Youll be listed on our website in places to find mezcal tribal.

In addition, this price includes a discount you pay 5 bottles and get 6 , God Deal!. Offer valid in CA and NY. 

Retail license in CA or NY.


Wholesaler Package Ensamble 103
If
you’re interested in sharing this exclusive product with your clients, consider
this special package that contains



1 voucher for 10
boxes of 6 bottles of Ensamble 103. 


You’ll also be listed on our website as a
distributor and receive preferential prices from Mezcal Tribal. 

This promotion
includes a discount, you pay 40 bottles and get 60, its 20 bottles for  free. Good Deal!
Exclusive for Wholesaler in all US or Retail in CA and NY. 




Wholesaler Package Mezcal Tribal Joven

If you’re interested in sharing this exclusive product with your clients, consider this special package that contains




1 voucher for 10 boxes of 6 bottles of Mezcal Tribal Joven. 


You’ll also be listed on our website as a distributor and receive preferential prices from Mezcal Tribal. 


This promotion includes a discount you pay 40 bottles and get 60, its 20 bottles for free!!.


 Exclusive for Wholesaler in all US  or Retail in CA and NY.  


Fan
Trip

We’d like to invite you
to join us in experiencing Mexican culture and flavors while learning about the
various distillation processes used to produce mezcal.  The journey begins
in Oaxaca. Hosts Bernardo and Andrea will take you to several places that inspire
them. Food (authentic Mexican cuisine) and travel within Mezcal Towns and some
interesting places close to Oaxaca. 4 days Food, hotel and Tour included (Flight
not included)  


We believe that we will
achieve our goal and be able to cover the costs of our first shipment to the
US. However, if our campaign goal is not met for some reason, your contribution
will be returned.

Frequently
     Asked Questions:



How
old do I have to be in order to participate?
In
accordance with US law, you must be at least 21 years of age at the time of
purchase.
When
can I expect to receive my bottle of mezcal?
Once
the campaign ends, it will take us approximately two months to complete the
necessary paperwork and an additional month to deal with product logistics. American Spirits Exchange LDT will be the company which will manage and import our mezcal. Therefore we hope that our product will be on American soil and ready for
delivery within three months, just in time for summer mid-July.

Your vaucher can be changed in the website of our partner company and sent to you. This partner company has the license to ship spirits across 24 states
on the US. 
If
you have Retail License in CA or NY, you vaucher can be used in American Spirits Exchange LDT  our partner company  licensed to import and sale spirits to retail stores in California and New York.
If
you have a distribution license, you vaucher can be used in  American Spirits Exchange LDT  our partner company  licensed to import spirits in USA.

What
makes your mezcals unique?
When
creating a new mezcal, our first step is to find a master mezcalier who
produces the best mezcal. We have tastings of the products of various
mezcaliers, and then choose the best product together. We also ensure that the
mezcal is made using an artisanal process and work carefully to create the
finest product possible.
At this point, we enter the creative part of the process,
when we try several options that combine different types of agave in different
proportions until we’ve found the unique flavor and aroma we’re looking for.
The final step is to label and package the mezcal.
Our
Background
Andrea
Serra studied to be a chef at the University of San Francisco and later
returned to Guadalajara, where she set out to work on various culinary
projects. Her spirit of sharing has led her to inspire generations of new chefs
throughout her 8 years of teaching.
Bernardo
Gonzales studied industrial engineering and has worked in the Mexican liquor
industry for 15 years.  Throughout that
time, he has had the opportunity to learn in-depth about the processes used by
the country’s large tequila, rum and mezcal industries. He has also
participated in numerous professional beverage tasting events, most notably
those involving agave. 
Thank you for taking the
time to watch the video and read about our campaign. Even if you can't
contribute, that doesn't mean you can't be a part of helping us in this huge step . You can:· 
Let your
friends know about our company and this campaign
· 
Use the
Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about this effortPlease make a comment on the page we will  love to now about you
· 
Follow us on
Facebook, twitter and instagram.
· 
If you have a
plan which can help us to reach this goal please send us an email trhough the
contact form in our website.
Thank you for your time,
attention, and support and enjoy life trough aromas and flavors, there are
everywhere.!!!

story:
Een jaar geleden hebben wij het roer omgegooid en hebben in Zuid Limburg een voormalig hotel/B&B gekocht. Op zoek naar meer rust, en met de ambitie een guesthouse op te zetten waar wij gasten een onvergetelijke ervaring kunnen bieden. Voordat het zover was moest het pand echter ingrijpend verbouwd worden!

Inmiddels bevinden wij ons in de 8e maand van de verbouwing. Alles is bijzonder voorspoedig verlopen, maar zoals zo vaak blijkt er meer tijd nodig te zijn om onze visie te realiseren. Meer tijd betekent meer manuren en meer kosten. Maar ook uitstel van de opening en het genereren van inkomsten.

Eén ding staat vast: medio juni 2016 zullen wij onze deuren openen en arriveren de eerste gasten. Daarom zoeken wij hulp zodat wij de laatste fase van de verbouwing af kunnen maken.

Wij hebben besloten om via crowdfunding geld op te halen door op dit moment al kamers ter beschikking te stellen: donaties vanaf EUR 175 worden beloond met een verblijf in ons guesthouse. Tegenover hogere bedragen staat verblijf in meerdere kamers, of voor een langere periode - dat kunnen wij in overleg bepalen.

Ons doel is EUR 25,000 op te halen. Hiermee kunnen wij het terras inrichten, de lift en serre plaatsen, en het laatste deel van het pand isoleren zodat wij onze gasten de luxe en het comfort bieden die wij belangrijk vinden.


Guesthouse / B&B theSJinn:

-  Gelegen in het Heuvellandschap van Zuid-Limburg. Middenin één van de populairste wandel- en fietsgebieden van Nederland, en vlakbij stiltegebieden met adembenemende natuur.

-  Kamers met eigen douche en toilet, tv, koelkast, waterkoker, nespresso machine, kluisje en  vloerverwarming. Er is een sauna en natuurlijk gratis Wifi

-  In principe verzorgen wij alleen ontbijt, maar in overleg kunnen gasten een lunch reserveren of in het guesthouse dineren. Wij gebruiken streekproducten en houden zoveel mogelijk rekening met uw dieet wensen

-  Duurzaamheid: tijdens de verbouwing zijn stenen en andere materialen zoveel mogelijk hergebruikt. Dankzij de zonnepanelen op het dak genereren wij onze eigen energie

-  Onze lift zorgt ervoor dat toegankelijkheid voor mensen met een lichamelijke beperking geen barrière is


Uw hulp wordt beloond:  elke donateur wordt vermeld en bedankt op onze website (tenzij u dat liever niet heeft natuurlijk). Vanaf €175 belonen wij u met een overnachting in een tweepersoonskamer (op basis van beschikbaarheid). U kunt reserveren door ons nu al te benaderen (info@thesjinn.nl) of op een later moment gebruik te maken van het reserveringssysteem op de website (www.thesjinn.nl)

-  €25  Persoonlijk bedankje

-  €50  High tea of borrel bij reservering in ons guesthouse

-  €100  Dinerbon te besteden bij lokale ondernemer

-  €175  1 kamer inclusief ontbijt

-  €250  1 kamer inclusief ontbijt, met high tea of borrel

-  €350  2 kamers inclusief ontbijt

-  €425  2 kamers inclusief ontbijt, met high tea of borrel

-  €500  3 kamers inclusief ontbijt

-  €575  3 kamers inclusief ontbijt, met high tea of borrel

-  €1000  toegang tot gehele guesthouse (4 kamers), met diner

Als u op een andere manier wilt helpen, of niet kan of wil doneren via deze website, neem dan alstublieft contact op met ons (info@thesjinn.nl of telefonisch 06-28868930). En het is al een hele hulp als u deze campagne wilt delen met vrienden en bekenden, of via een sociaal netwerk zoals Facebook

story:
Help One92 get off the street! 

Operating as a non-profit arts & culture blog for over 14 months, One92.com has been providing an online platform for emerging artists, writers, photographers, filmmakers, creative brands and local businesses that represent Kissimmee's underground cultures. One92 is expanding its unique style of coverage to the entire Central Florida area to provide an alternative media outlet that represents the culture that we see and doesn't play into a particular narrative.



We are looking to expand by improving our online content, redesigning our website, growing our social media networks, covering our yearly operating costs, and by branding ourselves with One92 shirts, stickers, and other merchandise. All so we can discover new, talented creative groups and individuals who deserve online attention and curate their material for the community. In doing so we also bring the community closer together by featuring leaders and creators within our city walls and promoting local spending in as many avenues as possible.

What We Need & What You Get


We are aiming for a goal of $5,000. These funds will be used for:

Paying off our web hosting fees for 2 years.

Hiring a web developer to improve our website.

Exclusive One92 merchandise.

Producing more online content and hosting more shows.


Our perks are set up into 2 different categories:

 Pedestrian Perks and Corporate Perks 

Pedestrian Perks are geared more toward our followers, newcomers, and other generous souls. Corporate Perks are designed as local business advertising options.

Note: No matter how much one donates, all contributors will be mentioned in the One92 Thanks You Special Feature post on One92.com when the campaign is over. 

Pedestrian Perks:

For $5, you will receive a One92 Digital Certificate of Gratitude, our very own special way of saying thank you. 

For $15, you will receive The One92 Yearbook, a digital zine reflecting on the time between June 2015, and June 2016, One92's first full year online. Also, you will receive a One92 Certificate of Gratitude.

For $25, you will receive The One92 Yearbook Special Edition. Along with the digital zine, the special edition comes with an exclusive read along commentary video featuring the creator of One92 Ryan Reese with other artists and colleagues who made One92's first year possible.You will also receive a One92 Certificate Of Gratitude as well.

                              The One92 Yearbook '15-'16 Digital Zine

Corporate Perks:

For $50,​ we will give your brand or business 2 shout outs on our heavily followed social media networks. 

For $300, you can sponsor 10 of One92's posts with your brand's or businesses Ad displayed throughout the post's content, along with 5 shout outs on our heavily followed social media networks. 

For $500, you can display your brands or businesses Ad on One92's main banner Ad spaces for 30 days, along with 10 shout outs on our heavily followed social media networks. 

For $700, your brand or business will receive a full feature expose by one of One92's talented content writers, along with a video showing off what your business has to offer. 

            Publishing content through our social media channels, One92's readership averages about 11,200 views monthly, with our peak being in May of 2016 seeing 23,561 visitors to One92.com and 26,342 page views from social media. 

With this campaigns contributions, we will be able to increase these numbers as we plan to modify our own advertising to reach an even larger audience. 
Examples of Corporate Perks:

          A Sponsored Post Ad featuring the mobile game company Astro Crow


                                A social media shout out featuring Main St. Pizza


                 What's Important About One92

                The most important part about One92 is that it serves as a curation platform for Central Florida art, culture, and local business. But no matter which city or state you live in, local art & culture today is different from what it was in the past. Before if you wanted to go to a local show you had to come across a flier on the street or hear about it via word of mouth from a friend. The only local artists you knew were, well, nobody. And a local business was that pizza shop your grandmother always took you to.

Nowadays you just get hit with a bunch of Facebook notifications, Instagram tags, and spammy emails from all sorts of people who are either show promoters, local artists, or business owners all trying to get the word out in the easiest way possible which that is through the internet.                                      

One92 was created with the thought in mind that the internet today is severely over saturated with groups and individuals who are desperately trying to get their work seen. Artists, businesses, brands - everyone is online, but then what? With all of the people here in Florida pushing their work just as hard, it is difficult to stand out and get people to notice your presence. 

One92 offers a platform for local creative individuals and businesses alike by curating content that features them either as content, or within content as advertisements. They can then use this content as tools to boost their online presence. 

By donating you are not only helping us reach the next level as content creators, but you are investing in great local stories, artwork, music, movies, and other great content topics that have yet to be given a chance be acknowledged online. With this funding, we will be able to uncover more over-looked people, stories and businesses. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Share our campaign on social media! 

Also be sure to follow One92!

https://www.facebook.com/One92media/

https://twitter.com/one92media

https://www.instagram.com/one92media/

One92.com

story:
Introducing Ben Ish Winery


We are a boutique kosher winery in Brooklyn, founded in memory of Benish Fried A'H. We specialize in producing delicious dry red wines (Cabernet Sauvignon and Lodi Zinfandel).

We use Cabernet Sauvignon & Lodi Zinfandel grapes from California and Chile. Our wines are ready to drink within 6 months and continue to improve year after year.


                                                                       

Customers love our wines and we have won several medals at commercial wine competitions. 


                         

We have created perks for all contribution levels (starting at $10) as our way of saying, "Thank you for helping us".


We need your contribution to make this happen!

Your contribution will allow us to move our winery into a larger manufacturing space and upgrade our tanks, barrels, crushers, presses, pumps, filtration and bottling system.


CALIFORNIA KOSHER CABERNET SAUVIGNON FOR ONLY $10

We believe a good quality dry kosher wine should retail for $10. Your contribution will help us upgrade in order to keep the cost at $10 per bottle.


Wine making classes

Your contribution will also enable us to offer wine making classes where families can come together and experience the joy of wine making. Visitors to our winery will be able to leave with everything they need (grapes included), enabling them to make their very own wine.


Perks you get for helping us!


With your Contribution, starting in September (2016), we will once again import Cabernet Sauvignon grapes from CALIFORNIA and ferment them here in Brooklyn. The wine will be ready in time for Purim (March 2017)  and you will be able to begin redeeming your vouchers at that time.

Depending on your contribution level, you will receive a voucher that can be redeemed at our locations in Brooklyn, Queens, Manhattan, Staten Island, Bronx, 5 Towns, Monsey and Monroe.
                                                              

                           

YOU CAN GIVE YOUR VOUCHER TO A FRIEND OR FAMILY MEMBER AND THEY CAN REDEEM IT FOR FREE WINE! 

You MUST be over 21 years of age to redeem a voucher.



Risks & Challenges

While we hope to achieve full funding during this campaign, we are prepared to scale down (or hopefully upwards if we exceed our campaign). In any event, we will go ahead with production and follow up with the perks for those who have contributed.

Also, with wine making, there is always the risk that something along the way may not go as planned. While this is our 7th successful harvest, there are many factors that come into play with wine making.  We are prepared for obstacles that may arise during the process. 

We will be updating all contributors  on the status of the fermentation and production as it progresses through email updates.   


Personalized Wine for any occasion!

                                                                           

We specialize in customizing wine bottles for just about any occasion. For the Perks $100 and up, you have the option of PERSONALIZING each and and every bottle with a different name! This makes for great Wedding, Bar/Bat Mitzvah, Sheva Brachos and corporate gifts! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We have created the perks so that there is something for everyone (starting at the $10 level). If you aren't able to contribute to this campaign, we would be so grateful if you could help us get the word out by letting others know about it.

Thank You so much for your help.

Ben Ish Winery
story_txt:
Introducing Ben Ish Winery

 We are a boutique kosher winery in Brooklyn, founded in memory of Benish Fried A'H. We specialize in producing delicious dry red wines (Cabernet Sauvignon and Lodi Zinfandel).

We use Cabernet Sauvignon & Lodi Zinfandel grapes from California and Chile. Our wines are ready to drink within 6 months and continue to improve year after year.
                                                                       


Customers love our wines and we have won several medals at commercial wine competitions. 


                         




We have created perks for all contribution levels (starting at $10) as our way of saying, "Thank you for helping us".

We need your contribution to make this happen!
Your contribution will allow us to move our winery into a larger manufacturing space and upgrade our tanks, barrels, crushers, presses, pumps, filtration and bottling system.

CALIFORNIA KOSHER CABERNET SAUVIGNON FOR ONLY $10
We believe a good quality dry kosher wine should retail for $10. Your contribution will help us upgrade in order to keep the cost at $10 per bottle.

Wine making classes
Your contribution will also enable us to offer wine making classes where families can come together and experience the joy of wine making. Visitors to our winery will be able to leave with everything they need (grapes included), enabling them to make their very own wine.

Perks you get for helping us!

With your Contribution, starting in September (2016), we will once again import Cabernet Sauvignon grapes from CALIFORNIA and ferment them here in Brooklyn. The wine will be ready in time for Purim (March 2017)  and you will be able to begin redeeming your vouchers at that time.

Depending on your contribution level, you will receive a voucher that can be redeemed at our locations in Brooklyn, Queens, Manhattan, Staten Island, Bronx, 5 Towns, Monsey and Monroe.

                                                                                         
YOU CAN GIVE YOUR VOUCHER TO A FRIEND OR FAMILY MEMBER AND THEY CAN REDEEM IT FOR FREE WINE! You MUST be over 21 years of age to redeem a voucher.
    
Risks & Challenges

While we hope to achieve full funding during this campaign, we are prepared to scale down (or hopefully upwards if we exceed our campaign). In any event, we will go ahead with production and follow up with the perks for those who have contributed.



Also, with wine making, there is always the risk that something along the way may not go as planned. While this is our 7th successful harvest, there are many factors that come into play with wine making.  We are prepared for obstacles that may arise during the process. 



We will be updating all contributors  on the status of the fermentation and production as it progresses through email updates.   

   
Personalized Wine for any occasion!
                                                                           

We specialize in customizing wine bottles for just about any occasion. For the Perks $100 and up, you have the option of PERSONALIZING each and and every bottle with a different name! This makes for great Wedding, Bar/Bat Mitzvah, Sheva Brachos and corporate gifts! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We have created the perks so that there is something for everyone (starting at the $10 level). If you aren't able to contribute to this campaign, we would be so grateful if you could help us get the word out by letting others know about it.

Thank You so much for your help.
Ben Ish Winery

story:
What Does SpareSource  do ?

There is various kinds of spare resources around our life: your assets,such as the car in garage when you are working; the private parking lot after you drive away; the spare space in your home. These spare resources could be put into use if there is a system which could perfectly match the demand and supplier.For instance,a resident in crowd city would lease his private parking lot when it is empty to someone looking for a nearby parking lot for a couple of hours. A working guy who stays in his office all the day could lease his car to a driver-license holder during working hours if there is a system which supervise the car in remote and make him feel comfortable to lease out. While another guy could probably need a car for an hour if there is a system that could offer him with it in a convenient and efficient way. The most significant obstacle to lease out your spare asset is that how to make your asset under your control when others is using it. SpareSource offer you such system to lease out your assets and to supervise the user. 

If you have no spare asset or spare time, but just have spare skills in aspects of sport, technique such as foreign language, math, engineer, programming or fashion,you can also find customers on SpareSource. For instance A yoga girl could sell out her yoga coaching hour in the morning to the guy who is still in bed or someone who want to try a new kind of spot. An enthusiast in fashion and trend could use SpareSource to post her skill to help people find their own fashion style.  

Beyond that, the SpareSource even could do more to make your life more comfortable. Housewives could sell delicacy in their spare time, which could be favored by the hungry single guys. A working parent would find a nanny to give his baby mother-like love in a cozy family environment during the daytime,instead of putting the baby in daycare center where baby hardly get human touch. While a woman with motherhood experience could enjoy and revive the happy hours spending with the little baby in her non-working day if she take care of the baby.  

How Does SpareSource Work?

There are three types of spare resources on SpareSource: private car&parking lot, home & space, service&goods. It is a user-friendly platform(website and APPs).  You can post your private car and parking lot by hour, by day or by week. If you need to use the car or parking lot, you can close the rental business for a while. Similarly,home or space owner could lease out the spare space by day or by week and close the rental business when you occupied it yourself. You can make your business active again whenever the spare resources are in status of idle. In the service&goods sector, you can post your home-made food, in-home tutor, technique service or personal fashion collections ect, whenever you have spare time. SpareSource offer you a business management system, which you can deal with your orders, communicate with clients and check the status of your spare resource when others is using it. You can withdraw the revenue of your business every Tuesday after you fulfill the orders.

story:
We are here to make your life easier and more creative! 

Thank you for looking into the BBQueCan and All About BBQ. Our mission is to make life more enjoyable and help you get more out of it with less hassle and waste. We developed the BBQueCan originally so we could BBQ and roast almonds, nuts and snacks easier. Since then it has grown into a great utensil for grilling and smoking so many different food items, after all who doesn't love good BBQ? No more Tin-foil hassles! 

The BBQueCan makes grilling so many different food items simple. Grilling and smoking items like Shrimp, Chicken wings, Asparagus and yes even Meatloaf are simple and easy! So many food items that are dificult to turn or contain while cooking or have the potential of going through the grate and into the grill can be placed in the BBqueCan and cooked to perfection. We all like Kabobs but they can be a hassle multiple food items do not cook at the same rate! With the BBQueCan we call them the Un-Kabob, place your cubed proteins/meat in the BBqueCan about half full first and cook for 30 minutes or so to get them to temperature and then fill the remaining spcae with your Veggies or fruit and finish the grilling process everything comes out perfect. These are just a few ideas and benefits the BBQueCan offers.  Some of the most challenging tasks with taking any product line to market is pricing, production time and inventory. By contributing to our campaign and purchasing the BBQueCan at the reduced prices, it enables us to increase our production quantities. This in turn will allow us to continue to offer the BBQueCan in a timely manner and maintain our pricing so that everyone can enjoy this barbequing experience at a reasonable cost. The variety of food items that can be made and recipes that can be created are endless and our goal is to share them with everyone. 

We understand there are a number of baskets, trays and mats on the market that can be used to accomplish a similar grilling experience but none of them accomplish what the BBQueCan does with the ease, simplicity and durability while saving so much space on the grill! The stainless steel construction and design have all been taken into consideration which together will last for generations and can be used on any grill, smoker or open fire with or without a rotisserie and can even be used in the oven! This is a product that can be handed down for generations like the lifelong family recipes.    

By contributing to our campaign you will receive one or more and/or will be able to give the BBQueCan as a special gift for that hard to buy for individual. Everyone loves good BBQ, especialy when its made easier.  

We have all the patents filed and are patent pending for both design and utility patents. We have produced and sold over a 1000 units in the past year. With your help we are looking to increase our next production order to 5000 units. With your generous contribution this will allow us to achieve our goal by May of 2017 for the upcoming BBQ season. All of the contributed funds will go towards purchasing inventory and marketing to make the BBQueCan available to all.  

Again we thank you for your time and consideration! If for any reason you don't feel the BBQueCan is a product you would consider for yourself or as a gift for someone else, please share our campaign with a friend! All of your help is greatly appreciated!!

story:
I am Jonathan Moloney, otherwise nicknamed CaveTroll for being enormous and ugly (My little joke that). I started out as a cost engineer but a few years ago was retrenched. Since then finding work has become nigh on impossible in my country. However, rather than sit around and hope for the best I decided to take the future into my own hands and start an archery and woodworking business from home. That was four and a half years ago...

My decision to start this campaign is that while I have enjoyed some small success so far and my name is becoming known, it has become quite urgent to build up a fully functional workshop. At the moment every cent earned goes straight back into the business to try to keep it stocked with wood, tools and consumables so it has yet to put food on the table and help support my family. I love my work. In fact I cannot think of anything else I would rather do. Indeed, I am passionate about producing high quality heirloom level items from bows and arrows through to furniture and the like. 

With your help I will be able to turn this into a viable business that can sustain my family and I and make my clients happier in the future as well. At present the workshop is a hastily put together workbench under a gazebo at my families home. With this campaign I will be able to build a small yet fully stocked and functional workshop capable of producing just about anything in wood and thus fulfill both my dream and help look after the people I love.

I need $35 000 (In South African rand that equates to  around R480 000) for this campaign to work perfectly. While that may seem like rather a lot each and every cent is budgeted, from building the workshop space and all the materials to the tools themselves and materials down to the last screw and dab of glue. There is even a contingency for exchange fluctuations and any tools not in stock here that have to be ordered from overseas. Any contributor is more than welcome to contact me for a full cost breakdown and each and every purchase will be accounted for. Absolute honesty and transparency is the order of the day.

Even if the total is not reached I can still build the workshop itself or even get a few of the needed tools to progress further in realizing this dream!

And yes there will indeed be perks! Everything from the contributors names being prominently displayed at the workshop and events right through to engraved wooden tankards, arrow sets and even my specialty Holmegaard bow custom made for the generous contributors! All of which will be shown via my upcoming YouTube channel as well!

Whilst I cannot say it will be particularly valuable to the contributor apart from the perks mentioned I can categorically state that your contributions will help keep the wolves from the door and not only help save a small business but help to push it to the next level of production. You can help me become a valuable and contributing member of society that works within my passion as well as help me gain the means and ability to support my family. There is not enough gratitude in the wold that I could give for such an opportunity!

Success so far has been small but it is there. My name as a quality producer of bows and someone with an excellent level of customer care is growing slowly but surely. Every client so far has been exceedingly happy with their bows and other projects done for them. This campaign will enable further and more stable growth in that regard!

Finally, there are always risks and challenges associated with any undertaking. As an ex cost engineer though all possible contingencies are planned for or at least guarded against. For example, if the South African market slows it does not mean failure as with this will be the addition of a website and etsy shop to serve the rest of the world for any item they would like. I would like this to become a global name with an exceptional service record.

 

In closing I would like to thank everyone deeply in advance for any and all help! And even if you can't contribute financially, you are still more than welcome to share this campaign everywhere you can via Indiegogo's sharing tools!!

 

Thank you once again!

story:
Hi!

My name is Heather and I have spent over twenty-five years in childcare.  I have assisted, taught, and directed both large and small schools.  Over the past year or so I have worked at night at UPS, doing something completely different was hard, exciting, exhausting, rejuvenating, and eye-opening. 

Now I've decided to open a family daycare which all my education and experience has prepared me for and working all night has shown me how many people are taking jobs late night/early morning to make ends meet and how much help they can use.

Contributing to my campaign will help me with start up costs so that I will be better ready to service those people who work hard at all hours of the day and night.

A little more about me:  I'm a single foster mom, I'm a Christian, I've lived my whole life in Southern California, and I love tacos. 

What We Need 

some of the places your money will go:

  • shade for backyard
  • emergency crib(s)
  • refurbished iPad
  • outdoor child-sized table
  • indoor child-sized table
  • supplies (office, craft, cleaning, etc)
  • childcare management software
  • printer/scanner

What You Get

  • the chance to make a real difference for working folks, especially those shift workers who we all rely on
  • paver with your name or handprint or message painted on it
  • Backer tee

The Impact

  • Your contribution will have a real world immediate effect on the early success of my business!  Even if I don't reach my full goal, I should be able to purchase several of the necessary items and be ready to open in the first quarter of 2018
  • Having run successful preschools, I know what items are necessary for immediate use and those which can wait a bit for later, I'm ready to get started asap!
  • As this campaign is running I'm doing the paperwork and home inspections to become licensed through the county to run a legal family child care in California. 

Risks & Challenges

  • One of the biggest challenges for any new business is customers.  I have a lot of experience and education, but I moved my family about a year and a half ago so we could have a bigger place and I don't know very many people in my new neighborhood.  It may take time to build trust and a good reputation in the community.
  • My plan for overcoming this is recommendations and reviews.  I have several parents I've asked to write references for me and I will provide those to potential clients.  I am also thinking of using Yelp and other social media.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please tell others about my campaign and encourage them to contribute!  
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Who is Key2MIA?

Key2MIA is a tourism and destination management company that allows you to "go beyond the beach" when visiting Miami.  We showcase the beauty of the city through personalized tours and experiences, bringing you the best in food, fashion, and culture.​

Even if you are a local, we provide you with a unique experience to go on an adventure in your own back yard. We aim to break away from the traditional guided tours and provide you with a personalized experience to give you a true taste of what Miami has to offer.  Learn how to make a signature cocktail with a mixologist, shop until you drop with a personal stylist at some of Miami's best shops, enjoy staple Miami cuisine, dance the night away at some of Miami's best clubs; experience Miami in a new way!

Booking your experience with Key2MIA is simple. The first step is simply calling or visiting www.key2MIA.com.  You can select a pre-designed experience, create your own, or select a mystery experience. From there, you'll complete our customization form so that you can truly make this experience your own.   Soak up the sun on a boat, get a five star massage by the beach, have a mixologist or chef come to you to teach a class, go on a walking tour to learn the culture and history of Miami while sampling culinary staples...you hold the key!

What We Need & What You Get

Let me start out by thanking you in advance for your support! Starting a business is no easy feat, especially in an industry that doesn't have a strong minority presence.  By contributing to the cause, you'll be able to receive your own Key2MIA experience, swag and more.  There are perks for each price point and a few of the faves are highlighted below. 

The goal is $10,000 and the money will go towards:

  • Startup funds for tourism certification renewals/annual fees, membership with tourism bureau to expand my reach, vehicle rentals for experiences, etc. 
  • Salary for 2 month period
  • Marketing and addition to website for streamlining our booking process

In return, you get 

$20: Key to the City                                                                

     

 $40: Sponsor A Playlist            

$60: Key2MIA Swag

With your contribution, you will allow more tourists to experience Miami like a local.  Last year, over 16 million people visited Miami.  Most people usually frequent our beautiful beaches, energetic nightclubs and our captivating casinos, but have no knowledge of all the jewels that await them in Miami.  With your contribution, you provide an option for these tourists to take the path less traveled and experience some of Miami's breathtaking architecture, culinary delights,  and the many diverse neighborhoods that make Miami so unique.  You are helping to make sure we have the right representation and how others are introduced to our neighborhoods.

You'll also allow tourists (and locals) to get a personal experience and truly see Miami through the eyes of a local.  Key2MIA local ambassadors LOVE where they live and can provide so much information about the city that they would never learn on their own.  Tours and experiences are also very intimate.  If a person books for them and a few friends, no one else is booked during that time.  No need to feel limited by the schedule of big tour groups.  Enjoy Miami at your own pace and ask questions; truly get to know Miami and your tour guide. 

Risks & Challenges

Like any small business, there are some risks and challenges.  However, with your help, I know that Key2MIA can be a huge success.  Here's why:

  • Miami is a major tourist location and there are several other tour services in the city as a result.  Where Key2MIA stands out is that we will not only provide tours, but we will customize your entire stay in Miami if needed.  We also provide each client with the Key to the City and a custom playlist, promoting local businesses and giving you a little piece of Miami to take home with you. 

Some people just can't contribute and that's understandable, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Word of mouth: tell others about this campaign. 
  • Sharing is caring: a simple repost, retweet or forward helps us just as much because it gets the word out about Key2MIA!  You can also use the Indiegogo share tools. 
  • Follow:  Find Key2MIA on Facebook and Instagram...we promise to follow back :)

Thank you for your support!  In the words of Mr. 305 himself, ¡dale!

 

ABOUT THE KEY-EO

Hello!

My name is Keymia and I am the curator of your ultimate destination management company, Key2MIA.

I spent most of my career in sales and eventually tried my hand in the world of advertising.  I never saw myself in the tourism industry, but I always like to say that life led me in this direction.  At the end of 2018, I lost the love of my life and, shortly after, my job.  With an eight year old dependent upon me and no light at the end of the tunnel, I felt defeated and frustrated.  A few days after taking those substantial blows, I had a conversation with my mother who was seeking recommendations for family that was visiting Miami in the next few months.  I noticed that she, like all others that would visit, asked the same three questions:

  • Where should I stay?
  • What are your recommendations on places to eat?
  • What things are there to do in Miami?

My mom had ignited the spark in me to start a business and answer these questions for many others visiting Miami. Being that I was once a novice in the city, I immersed myself into learning more about the 305 and fell in love with it.  Those things coupled with my passion for learning about other cultures and walks of life, made this new career path the perfect route for me to begin the new year.   I wanted to change the views that tourists have about Miami.  My mission is to allow tourists to think beyond the beach while also bringing diversity to how tourists can reach our communities.
story_txt:
Who is Key2MIA?
Key2MIA is a tourism and destination management company that allows you to "go beyond the beach" when visiting Miami.  We showcase the beauty of the city through personalized tours and experiences, bringing you the best in food, fashion, and culture.​
Even if you are a local, we provide you with a unique experience to go on an adventure in your own back yard. We aim to break away from the traditional guided tours and provide you with a personalized experience to give you a true taste of what Miami has to offer.  Learn how to make a signature cocktail with a mixologist, shop until you drop with a personal stylist at some of Miami's best shops, enjoy staple Miami cuisine, dance the night away at some of Miami's best clubs; experience Miami in a new way!
Booking your experience with Key2MIA is simple. The first step is simply calling or visiting www.key2MIA.com.  You can select a pre-designed experience, create your own, or select a mystery experience. From there, you'll complete our customization form so that you can truly make this experience your own.   Soak up the sun on a boat, get a five star massage by the beach, have a mixologist or chef come to you to teach a class, go on a walking tour to learn the culture and history of Miami while sampling culinary staples...you hold the key!

What We Need & What You Get
Let me start out by thanking you in advance for your support! Starting a business is no easy feat, especially in an industry that doesn't have a strong minority presence.  By contributing to the cause, you'll be able to receive your own Key2MIA experience, swag and more.  There are perks for each price point and a few of the faves are highlighted below. 
The goal is $10,000 and the money will go towards:

Startup funds for tourism certification renewals/annual fees, membership with tourism bureau to expand my reach, vehicle rentals for experiences, etc. 
Salary for 2 month period
Marketing and addition to website for streamlining our booking process

In return, you get 
$20: Key to the City                                                                
     
 $40: Sponsor A Playlist            

$60: Key2MIA Swag


With your contribution, you will allow more tourists to experience Miami like a local.  Last year, over 16 million people visited Miami.  Most people usually frequent our beautiful beaches, energetic nightclubs and our captivating casinos, but have no knowledge of all the jewels that await them in Miami.  With your contribution, you provide an option for these tourists to take the path less traveled and experience some of Miami's breathtaking architecture, culinary delights,  and the many diverse neighborhoods that make Miami so unique.  You are helping to make sure we have the right representation and how others are introduced to our neighborhoods.
You'll also allow tourists (and locals) to get a personal experience and truly see Miami through the eyes of a local.  Key2MIA local ambassadors LOVE where they live and can provide so much information about the city that they would never learn on their own.  Tours and experiences are also very intimate.  If a person books for them and a few friends, no one else is booked during that time.  No need to feel limited by the schedule of big tour groups.  Enjoy Miami at your own pace and ask questions; truly get to know Miami and your tour guide. 

Risks & Challenges
Like any small business, there are some risks and challenges.  However, with your help, I know that Key2MIA can be a huge success.  Here's why:
Miami is a major tourist location and there are several other tour services in the city as a result.  Where Key2MIA stands out is that we will not only provide tours, but we will customize your entire stay in Miami if needed.  We also provide each client with the Key to the City and a custom playlist, promoting local businesses and giving you a little piece of Miami to take home with you. 


Some people just can't contribute and that's understandable, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Word of mouth: tell others about this campaign. 
Sharing is caring: a simple repost, retweet or forward helps us just as much because it gets the word out about Key2MIA!  You can also use the Indiegogo share tools. 
Follow:  Find Key2MIA on Facebook and Instagram...we promise to follow back :)

Thank you for your support!  In the words of Mr. 305 himself, ¡dale!

story:
My name is Enid Waite, and I’m the Mommy-In-Chief at PDC Play Date Clubhouse.  I’m a New York City mom of 3 children, AGES 2, 8, and 9.  During my reign as a stay-at-home mom for the past few years, I have had to lean on my marketing background; let’s just say… very heavy on the research side.

If you live in an urban environment and have children, you are probably a good researcher too.  We are constantly mining for kid-friendly activities and entertainment that conveniently fits in our budget.  If you have more than one child like my hubby and me, then it becomes a miniature people’s version of Games of Thrones.  May the cleverest child present their case for thee activity as thee less agile half-ling reserves revenge for another day. And the thought of playdates at home always seems like a good idea, but the vision of seeing your living room in the post-apocalyptic version of itself is Daenerys Last War maddening.

Enter, PDC Play Date Clubhouse, an indoor urban good time oasis that is family-centric with ‘if I had extra living space’ benefits.  We have funds to makes this happen; however, this project is expensive!  This is where we ask you to help preserve parental sanity and keep living rooms free of toys and slime.

Read on and accept your Play Date invitation.  I’m ready to race you to the slide.

So, we need a little “play” money, not Monopoly money (we have that at PDC).  Keeping children happy is costly, not to mention New York real estate, contractors, indoor playground equipment, pounds of crayons, glitter glue, and more.   We need an additional $275,000 to support the cost of equipment and furnishing necessary to quickly get the space up and running as fast as possible. The full cost of the project has been estimated to leap above $1 million with build-out cost and lease requirements absorbing a large chunk of the monies we have already raised and invested.

In return for your contribution, you get access to the playspace of your dreams. An indoor playground that will be accessible rain or shine, and if you don’t feel like sliding, you can make art in the craft area, and if the kids hit that creative block, they can meet up with their friends and family in the café. Most NYC kid’s clubs are not big enough for hanging out, parties and dancing, but ours will be SUPERSIZED… so HIT IT, DJ!

The funding to make PDC Playdate Clubhouse a reality is not child’s play, but we are committed to enriching the lives of young children, connecting cultures and building the family bond. 

Your contribution is not just about giving children a place to play and create year-round; your gift supports the science of play.  Research shows that play can improve a child's ability to plan, organize, get along with others, and regulate emotions. Also, play helps with language, math, and social skills, and even helps children cope with stress.

Contributing to PDC Playdate Clubhouse also provides an oasis for children in New York City, that may be taken for granted by suburbanites and rural dwellers.  The majority of residents in greater New York City live in apartments of which the average size is 866 square feet.  Family sizes in Manhattan average 2.99 and the outer boroughs 3.66.  That’s a tight squeeze.

They say money can’t buy happiness, but we believe this is the one exception to the rule.  Our goal is to provide a happy place for families.  At PDC, children have a safe, vibrant environment to exercise not just their bodies, but their imaginations.

Oddly, in our diverse utopia, there are not enough non-home options that induce social interactions family style.  PDC will do its part to give parent’s playdates as well, and yeah,… you can take a turn on the slide too.

Thank you for your contribution, and we’ll save you a seat at the craft table.

 

We were hoping you could MAKE SOME NOISE for PDC Playdate Clubhouse.  Spread the joy and let everyone know what we are doing.  Even if you cannot financially support the campaign, we need you to start a GAME OF PHONES - 21st-century style. 

Please forward this link with a short note of support and ask the recipient to do the same.  You might want to think of yourself as a messenger of HAPPINESS.

Remember to follow us on social media:

  • Instagram - PDCPLAYDATECLUBHOUSE
  • Facebook -  PLAYDATECLUBHOUSE
  • Twitter  - PDC_GO
  • Website  - PLAYDATECLUBHOUSE.COM

For media, contact Karen Taylor Bass, kt@taylormademediapr.com, 917-509-3061.
